desc: This course provides an overview of film studies by focusing on three areas: history of film, production (the basic tools of film-making), and theory (the basic vocabulary of film analysis). Students develop visual literacy through engagement with the primary structures, methods, practitioners, history, ideas, and vocabularies of film studies.
name: Intro to Film Studies
notes: This course has class-year limits. Please note that the days/times of this course have been changed from MWF to TTh. The Monday evening film screening remains the same.
title: Introduction to Film Studies
